item.title: MT3501: Section .
item.description: Introduction Course info . .. Lecturer: James Mitchell (jdm3@). Prerequisite: MT2501. Lectures: Mon (even), Tue & Thu 12 noon, via Teams. Tutorials: These begin in Week 2 (online in Week 2, possibly in person from Week 3 onwards, more details in class): Times: M̄on 2pm (Maths Theatre B), M̄on 3pm (Maths Theatre B), T̄ues 3pm (Maths Theatre B), T̄ues 4pm (Maths Theatre B), T̄hurs 2pm (Maths Theatre B), F̄ri 1pm (online)

item.title: MT3501: Section 2.
item.description: 2.1 Definition and examples Before we can define vectors spaces, we must define . Scalars are just any element in a field. A field in minecraft Most of the time, if you want to keep things simple, you can think of scalars as being . Definition 1 (Field.). A field is a set \(F\) with two binary operations \(F\times F \to F\) \[\begin{aligned} (\alpha,\beta) & \mapsto \alpha+\beta & (\alpha,\beta) & \mapsto \alpha\beta \end{aligned}\] called addition and multiplication such that always
